70010000094594.description:
Welcome to Barista Coffee Simulator, where your love for coffee becomes the heart of a growing café business. Start with a simple machine and a handful of ingredients, then build your way up by crafting beautiful, flavorful drinks for every kind of customer—from early-morning regulars to curious first-timers.

As your café gains popularity, you’ll expand your menu with new recipes, upgrade your equipment for better performance, and carefully manage supplies to keep everything running smoothly. Hire and train staff to help during busy hours, and give your space a personal touch with décor and layout choices that make your café truly your own.

Whether you're steaming milk for the perfect cappuccino or juggling a dozen custom orders, Barista Coffee Simulator blends creativity, strategy, and charm. Build a cozy spot that keeps customers coming back—and maybe, just maybe, survive one more customer asking if their triple-shot macchiato was organic.
70010000094594.intro: A Cozy Café Adventure, Brewed to Perfection.
70010000094594.name: Barista Coffee Simulator

70010000082625.description: Start your engines, gearheads - it's time for Hot Rod Mayhem! Prove yourself as the ultimate little racer by putting your speed and swerving skills to the test in wild races and one-of-a-kind trials! Use perilous pick-ups, like the tricky Marble or the Homing Dart, to leave your opponents in the dust!
70010000082625.name: Hot Rod Mayhem

70010000089548.description:
Embark on a dreamlike adventure in the iconic Monument Valley, the award-winning puzzle game where architecture defies reality. Guide Princess Ida through surreal monuments, uncovering hidden paths and optical illusions that challenge perception.

Step into a world where the impossible becomes possible. In Monument Valley, you’ll guide the Silent Princess Ida through breathtaking landscapes, twisting staircases, and ever-shifting monuments. Each puzzle is a work of art, inspired by minimalist design, ancient architecture, and mind-bending impossible geometry.

Manipulate the environment to reveal hidden paths, outsmart the enigmatic Crow People, and uncover the secrets of the Sacred Geometry. With intuitive controls, an immersive soundtrack, and vibrant visuals, Monument Valley is an experience for every type of player. 

Features:

- Mind-Bending Puzzles: Rotate, shift, and reshape the world to reveal new paths.

- Beautiful Visuals: Inspired by optical illusions, and ancient architecture from around the world.

- Immersive Sound: A reactive, personal soundtrack that enhances every move you make.

- Complete Edition: Includes the Forgotten Shores expansion for the full journey.

Can you guide Ida on her quest for forgiveness? Discover why Monument Valley has touched the hearts of millions of players worldwide!

ustwo games are proud independent developers, best known for the award-winning Monument Valley series, Land’s End, Assemble with Care and Alba: A Wildlife Adventure.
70010000089548.name: Monument Valley

70010000089553.description:
Return to the world of impossible architecture in Monument Valley 2. Guide Ro and her child through surreal monuments, uncovering hidden paths and discover the power of letting go.

Monument Valley 2 invites you on an award-winning emotional puzzle adventure where architecture transforms as you play. Join Ro and her child as they explore stunning, ever-shifting worlds, solving optical illusions that challenge perception and their lives.

Every puzzle is a beautiful work of art, blending vibrant colours and stunning designs with an emotional story and soundtrack. Monument Valley 2 is a heartfelt tale of growth and independence that all players can enjoy. 

Features:

- Touching Narrative: Experience the emotional story of parenthood and letting go

- Individually Crafted Puzzles: All new interactions to explore the changing dynamics between Ro and her Child. 

- Contemporary Art: Inspired by global architecture and contemporary art.

- Complete Journey: Every chapter is included for the most satisfying experience.

Discover the magic of Monument Valley 2 with Ro and her Child in this emotionally powerful sequel to Monument Valley.

ustwo games are proud independent developers, best known for the award-winning Monument Valley series, Land’s End, Assemble with Care and Alba: A Wildlife Adventure.
70010000089553.intro: A Story of Parenthood, Growth, and Discovery
70010000089553.name: Monument Valley 2

70010000091106.description:
Embark on an epic adventure in Chained Survive Together. Bound by mystical chains to your companions, your goal is to ascend from the depths of the ocean by navigating treacherous underwater landscapes and overcoming obstacles. Perfect coordination is crucial as you traverse the dark, submerged realms filled with unique challenges.

Key Features:
• Upward Challenge: 
Experience a unique vertical twist on the runner genre as you climb from the ocean’s depths.
• Chain Physics: 
Realistic chain dynamics add strategic depth to your journey through the underwater abyss.
• Diverse Realms: 
Explore multiple submerged worlds with distinct and challenging environments.
• Difficulty Modes: 
Choose from Beginner, Normal, and Abyss modes to match your skill level.
• Conquer Territories: 
Claim and dominate new underwater areas as you ascend.
• Quests and Missions: 
Complete quests to test your skills and unlock new abilities.
• Skills and Abilities: 
Master and upgrade powerful skills to aid your journey through the ocean’s depths.
• Conquer Challenges Together:
Navigate perilous underwater terrains while chained to your companions. 
Play solo or team up in multiplayer mode, requiring precision and coordination for survival. Embrace the challenge, master the strategy, and lead your team to victory.
70010000091106.intro: Chains Can't Hold You Back—Fight to Survive Together!
70010000091106.name: Chained Survive Together

70010000087135.description:
There comes a time in everyone’s life when they must leave their home behind and find another. Now in Moving Houses, it's your turn… whether you really want to leave or not. Enjoy a silly physics-based game about moving on as you box up your life while immersed in casual comfy gameplay and the instant gratification of task-based gamification of packing chores. Be neat, be careful or be a chaos goblin. The choice is yours!

As you navigate in first-person, you’ll pick up furniture, plants, paintings and more, loading them carefully (or not so carefully) into the moving truck, completing checklists of important tasks to progress. Run, jump, kick, drop, throw, rotate objects and more! But be warned, not all is as it seems in this quiet little house. An eerie mystery could lie beneath the mundane monotony of the task at hand.

Features:

• Run, jump, kick, drop, throw and rotate objects!
• Load items into the moving truck and complete lists of packing chores to progress.
• Create your own fun through silly physics-based chaos!
• Freely explore your house in first-person perspective.
• Uncover an underlying mystery that may or may not be the reason for leaving this place!
70010000087135.intro: Pack it all up as you move furniture, house plants and more in whimsical first-person style!
70010000087135.name: Moving Houses

70010000054114.description:
Eden, the great sea that contains the world's memories as "colors."
The seven girls that have the power to control colors are destined to battle each other...
Experience the battles of colorful girls in a cruel fate, set in a fleeting yet vibrant world!

■ A battle royale that in JUST 3 minutes
Irisy Aqua is a strategy battle royale game. You will be one of the seven characters and fight against others to destroy towers. Every battle ends in about three minutes, so everyone can enjoy this game casually, even if you are not good at PvP.

■ Fully voiced scenario mode
You can enjoy a fully voiced scenario with splendid voice actors in the single-player mode. Experience the story of girls in a cruel fate in profound worldview.

■ Color change system
The main feature of this game is that the characters' color change in real time during a battle. Red, Green, and Blue - the three primary light colors are parameterized and reflected into the characters' strength and graphics. Each time you play, you can grow your character into various colors.

■ Customizing mode
You can customize the skills of each character as you like. Build your deck and enter the battle. Skill cards will be added as you progress to the scenario mode, and more cards be added by the developers.

■Season Management
Irisy Aqua will run seasons online. You can earn rewards such as titles and skill cards by participating in season matches.   There are also features that make the battle fun, such as a ranking system and a replay system.
70010000054114.intro: This is the Genesis war of colorful and pitiful girls.
70010000054114.name: Irisy Aqua

70010000062589.description:
REVAMPED GAMEPLAY
Gameplay has been rebuilt from scratch in Unreal Engine 5, giving smoother gameplay and flashier special attacks.

PLAY AS THE ENEMY
Take on the role of powerful adversaries from the Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds universe, each with their own distinct combat style and abilities in Arcade Mode.

REMASTERED SOUNDTRACK
Players can choose an all-new soundtrack composed by all-girl J-rock band The Phantom Breakers or the classic versions from PB:BG or PB:BG Overdrive.
70010000062589.intro: Experience the side-scrolling beat'em up with the heart of a fighting game and hardcore pixel art anime action!
70010000062589.name: Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Ultimate

70010000076554.description:
Use your blunderbus to launch yourself from platform to platform, taking down enemies in graceful bullet-time aerial battles! Hone your skills and unlock even tougher encounters!

Monstrously privileged
The French aristocracy have morphed into an army of bile-spewing zombies. Take down gigantic bosses and uncover a plot against France herself!

Explore la Bastille
Storm your way through the sprawling Bastille prison complex, gathering parts to build yourself an airship. Discover secrets in shadowy corners and unlock new content.

Features:
-Thrilling hack’n’slash and bullet-time combat! 
-A sprawling map full of secrets!
-Monstrous zombie bossfights!
-Test your blade and unlock tougher challenges!
-Fluency in French not required, just revolutionary spirit!
70010000076554.intro: A fast-paced, bullet-time action-platformer with speedrunning and revolutionary flair.
70010000076554.name: Sacre Bleu

70010000082764.description:
Reimagined in Minter’s signature assault of colors, shapes and sounds, this new take on the eclectic arcade title is built from the ground up with new challenges, new twists, and a whole lot of llamas.

The premise of I, Robot is simple: You take control of an ox-headed robot on a mission to outwit the all-seeing eye. In each level, you’ll navigate across tiles, flipping each tile to proceed to the next. Make sure you don’t jump while the eye’s watching, or you’ll be zapped away in a flash. If you make it across the tiles, you’ll race down a tube blasting away any enemy shapes that move into your path and try to stop you. And you have to do all this inside of the 3D space of Minter’s kaleidoscopic visualizer.

Don’t get too comfortable, Minter has also thrown in some arena levels that challenge you to pick out and blast an onslaught of lethal enemies.

At its core it is a game that only Llamasoft could have made. A cacophony of colors dazzle your eyes as the music gradually builds up based on your progress. If you want to take a break from the arcade action, jump into the ungame, where you can channel your inner Jeff Minter and play around with all the sights and sounds from the game.

Features

- 55 levels with a variety of challenges to conquer in each
- Unique tube-shooter bonus stages between each level
- Llamasoft's unique brand of mind melting visuals
- Procedural music that builds as you rack up a high score
- Earn your bragging rights in the online leaderboards
70010000082764.intro: Jeff Minter is back with another unique take on a 1980s Atari arcade game.
70010000082764.name: I, Robot

70010000083270.intro: Chessarama is a collection of puzzle and strategy games inspired by Chess.
70010000083270.name: Chessarama

70010000083293.description:
Humankind abandoned Earth as it entered another ice age. Over time, those who came to hold dominion over the world were... rabbits!?
After humanity left, the rabbits referred to humans as "giants" and revered the massive ruins left behind as "Smokestack Mountain." Those fearless enough to violate and excavate this sacred site are known as "rust diggers." The protagonist, an old rabbit named Stamp, is one such rust digger, making a daily routine of excavating Smokestack Mountain.

One day, on his way back from exploring Smokestack Mountain, Stamp encounters a rust digging team known as the "BBs" and ends up joining them in a quest to delve deeper into the heart of Smokestack Mountain.

Along the way, Stamp discovers records from ancient information storage devices called "D-TAMs" scattered throughout the ruins. One of these records appears to belong to his estranged daughter, hinting at her peril and revealing hidden truths about the world he once believed in.

To unravel many mysteries and follow his daughter's trail, Stamp continues his journey into the depths of the ruins...

- Mysterious setting
Experience exhilarating action and mystery as you dig ever deeper into the giant ruins!

- "Smash and Dash" your way through mazelike ruins 
With your mech's ninja-like speed and mobility, explore the ruins by smashing through blocks, and loot any treasure that awaits!

- RPG-like progression and customization
Upgrade your mech with parts and materials collected from within the ruins! Improve Stamp's skills through intense battles with enemies guarding treasures!
70010000083293.intro: Cute little bunny? Not a chance.
70010000083293.name: Rusty Rabbit

70010000089433.description:
Engage in a quirky, voice-acted exploration of philosophical dilemmas, where humor meets profound thought. It takes about 2 hours to finish.

Interactive Philosophy: Step into the shoes of history's greatest thinkers, engaging with dilemmas like the Trolley Problem and Schrödinger’s Cat.

Dynamic Gameplay Modes: Choose from Sim Mode for open-ended exploration, Challenge Mode for timed tests, or Story Mode for narrative-driven insights.

Stylish Presentation: Experience the conundrums in a simple yet expressive black-and-white art style, highlighting the abstract and absurd nature of philosophical inquiry.

Voice Acting with a Twist: Enjoy a dynamic narration that might break the fourth wall, adding character and levity to each philosophical puzzle.

Educational Yet Entertaining: Not just for philosophy buffs; it's an accessible way to ponder life's big questions while having a laugh.

This game promises to make you think, laugh, and question—often all at once. Perfect for those looking to scratch both the comedic and cerebral itch.
70010000089433.intro: This is a stupid game that might include Trolley Problem, Ship of Theseus, Brain in a Vat, Infinite Monkey, Sisyphus, Prisoner's Dilemma, Schrodinger's Cat, etc.
70010000089433.name: Thought Experiment Simulator

70010000089475.description: Welcome to the Mini Hockey Cup, where only the best rise to the top! Battle your way through 4 competitive leagues and prove your skills in 3 challenging tournaments. Customize your strategy by upgrading formations and improving your team’s performance in the shop. Every match brings you closer to glory—will you lead your team to victory and claim the championship? Lace up your skates and hit the ice!
70010000089475.intro: Lace up your skates! Your favorite ice sport is here in a new fun form—control the puck and upgrade your team!
70010000089475.name: MINI HOCKEY CUP

70010000089651.description:
LunarLux is an anime-inspired action-adventure RPG that takes place on the Moon! A thousand years ago, humanity lived on the now volcanic and lifeless earth-like planet known as Terra. Due to the planetary catastrophe, ASTRA, humans were forced to find a new home. Unfortunately, no habitable planet existed within a reasonable distance, so the remaining survivors made their way to Luna, the moon that orbits Terra. 

Filled with hope, dreams, and determination, Humanity continued to survive and flourish in a new home. Centuries later in the year 30XX, Luna became home to some of the most brilliant human minds in existence (and their creations). However, humanity's existence is now threatened by an oncoming antimatter comet - the same comet that wiped out the people of Terra a thousand years ago!

Join Lunar Warrior Bella as she fights her way across the Moon to find a way to destroy the comet before it wipes out life as we know it! Battle the mysterious monsters known as Murks using a hybrid turn & action-based battle system, uncover the secrets of a lost civilization, and save the Moon!
70010000089651.intro: Experience a sci-fi action-adventure RPG on the Moon in the year 30XX and save humanity from a deadly comet!
70010000089651.name: LunarLux

70010000090372.description:
Vinebound is a co-op first roguelike for 1-2 players where you have to coordinate attacks with a ping-pong cooldown to defeat hordes of enemies. 

Can your friendship survive the botanical mayhem of Garden Lands? 

Features:
- True Co-op Madness – Bound together by a vine, every step is a team effort, every stretch a potential disaster—so plan wisely... or embrace the chaos!

- Flavourful Builds – Create wild combos! Pumpkin Bombs, Boomeringues, blazing Spicy Sauces, and more!

- Chaotic Arenas – Dodge shifting lava walls, slide on icy floors, and battle elite enemies in unpredictable arenas.
70010000090372.intro: You're tied together, but with cooperation this can be your mightiest weapon!
70010000090372.name: Vinebound: Tangled Together

70010000091574.description:
You don't need Mishelin Star to create the best restaurant in the world. Who says street food can't be delicious?  

Open a real street food restaurant in your city and make it a legend. It's all for your beloved customers and let everyone come and find something tasty. Make this place trendy and watch your business grow!  

Take on the role of a street food entrepreneur and master the art of food preparation, customer service and efficient management. From sourcing fresh ingredients to designing workflows. You'll need strategic planning and quick decision-making to grow your business and keep your customers happy.

Street Food Restaurant Owner is a cooking game that puts you in charge of a street food cafe. Cook delicious meals, serve hungry customers, and manage your ingredients wisely to avoid waste. 

Your reputation is everything - manage your food stall, serve delicious meals and impress customers to build your brand. Every satisfied customer boosts your reputation and unlocks upgrades and new recipes. But beware - one mistake can ruin your reputation. 

Check out this fun new game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Let them taste and fall in love with your delicious street food!
70010000091574.intro: Street food can be great! Prove it.
70010000091574.name: Street Food Restaurant Owner

70010000092300.description: Step into the colorful world of Maths Pals, where six delightful animal friends are ready to make math fun, interactive, and easy to learn! Designed for kids in Grade 1 and Grade 2, this engaging educational game will help young learners develop essential math skills while having a great time.
70010000092300.intro: Join six adorable animal friends on a journey to master math! From counting to multiplication, tackle fun challenges, earn stars, and watch your skills soar—all at your own pace!
70010000092300.name: Maths Pals

70010000092743.description:
Enjoy the thrill of walking the fine line between hiding and getting caught!
Share Joy-Con™, and up to 4 players can join in the fun!
Reach for the ultimate high score!

[Time Attack]
Compete for the fastest clear time and earn a top spot on the leaderboards!
Pay attention to the patrolling characters and carefully decide when to play and when to hide!

[Battle]
Compete against friends or CPU controlled opponents for the highest score!
Be bold and take risks to rack up the most points and win the game!
70010000092743.intro:
Let's stay up and play all night long!
Be stealthy, don't get caught, and play the night away!
70010000092743.name: Sneaky All-Nighter

70010000093432.description:
When Hana’s garden of musical flowers are scattered across a sky full of beautiful islands, she must turn to the magical Tempopo for help returning them. Chaotic and uncoordinated by nature, the Tempopo rely on Hana’s conducting skills to keep on the right track, and solve each island's puzzle.

PUZZLE THROUGH THE SEASONS 
Each island is a challenge of planning and execution. Experiment with different configurations and routes, instruct every Tempopo to play their part as they smash, block, lift and push each other through the puzzles that span all four seasons.

LET THE MUSIC PLAY 
A bright and joyful world that’s permeated with music, where every living element moves in harmony with a rhythmic heartbeat. With a soundtrack by BAFTA award-winning composer & audio director Jeff van Dyck, every note is a joy. 

SPACE TO GROW
With each puzzle you solve, the flowers you rescue become a part of your very own melodic garden. Each type of flower sings its own tune, and you can synthesize their melodies to enjoy unique musical performances.
70010000093432.intro:
Puzzle Through the Seasons
Conduct the Tempopo
Keep on Beat
70010000093432.name: Tempopo

70010000094439.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Jebu-do, Korea with "Real" footage! 
This work takes place in Jebu-do. 
There are a total of 8 flight courses. 
1080P high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to 8 locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Jebu-do, Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery.
70010000094439.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!
70010000094439.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Jebu-do

70010000094708.description:
Unwind with Cozy Stitch Puzzle – a heartwarming puzzle game full of cuddly fun! Match colorful plushie pairs across 126 cozy levels, each uniquely generated for endless replayability. With 9 delightful plushie categories – from animals and sea creatures to magical beings and toys – every puzzle feels like stitching together a soft and soothing story.

Choose your difficulty and play at your own pace – it’s the perfect pick for cozy gamers of all ages!

- 126 puzzles
- 3 difficulty levels
- 9 adorable plushie themes
- Infinite replay thanks to procedural generation

Get comfy and start stitching today!
70010000094708.intro: Relax, match, and stitch your way through 126 cuddly puzzles full of plushie charm and cozy vibes!
70010000094708.name: Cozy Stitch Puzzle

70010000095029.description:
"Normally I'd dig a hole in me and then fall into it, But this time I decided that instead of falling in, I would willingly go in. Here I am, drifting on the shores of my life."

Play as Leila and traverse through all phases of her life, uncovering her pivotal life moments. By unraveling puzzles imbued with the fragments of her narrative, you'll comprehend the motives behind Leila's life decisions. As you delve deeper into her psyche and her emotional landscape, you'll discover facets of your own self mirrored in the life journey of this seemingly ordinary woman.

Step into journey through the layers of Leila, a captivating, story-driven adventure that comes alive with charming narration and stunning artwork. Every frame is a masterpiece, handcrafted with detailed traditional animation, and each moment is accentuated with an evocative original soundtrack.

Embark on Leila's journey as she grapples with the complexities of love, trust, and the shadows of her past. Navigate thought-provoking puzzles that challenge and engage, deepening the immersion in her tale.

What to expect:

♥ 4 Chapters,
♥ Story-related puzzles and mini games,
♥ Hand-drawn cinematics,
♥ 16 original soundtracks,
♥ Voice acting in English,
♥ Press and Drag Gameplay.
70010000095029.intro: Dive into Leila’s mind—a dreamlike puzzle adventure of memories and mystery.
70010000095029.name: Leila

70010000095130.description:
Peace has returned to OZ Wizard Country—or so it seemed. Just as the land begins to heal, a new darkness emerges from the ruins of the Dark Sorcerer’s lair. A forgotten curse has awakened the Shadow Queen, an even greater force of evil that threatens to plunge OZ into eternal night!

But there’s still hope—you! The new wizard in town must rise once again, mastering powerful new spells and discovering enchanted artifacts to banish the shadows. Travel across mystical lands, bursting cursed bubbles to free trapped magic and restore light to OZ Wizard Country.

With each level you conquer, the darkness weakens. Take on the challenge as you battle through new enchanted realms, dangerous dungeons, and mystical forests filled with tricky puzzles and hidden treasures. The fate of OZ is in your hands!

Are you ready to cast your spells and save the realm once more?


Feature :
★ All new 250 magical levels! *
★ Special boosters & Magic portions to help you pass those tricky levels.
★ Easy to play, and progressively challenging to master!
★ Daily awards, more and more coins drop everyday.
★ Enchanting graphics and sound effects that will leave you spellbound.
★ Multiple languages support.
★ Nintendo Switch™ online Leaderboards to show off your rankings! **
★ Supports Joy-Con™, Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controller and touch screen.

 

Note :
* First 35 levels are unlocked tutorial levels. Follow by 215 all new unique levels.
** Optional, player can opt-out from submitting high scores to online leaderboard.
70010000095130.intro: Return to OZ: The Shadow’s Revenge
70010000095130.name: Bubble Wizard II Saga

70010000095133.description:
A world full of sunshine, fun, and romance awaits you on the most beautiful tropical island. Explore this island paradise, rescue charming girls, and create the home of your dreams. Everything you’ve always imagined is within your reach!

Do you love decorating and designing? Here, you can build your dream home, customize it with unique furniture, and add that special touch you’ve always wanted. From cozy beachside cottages to tropical villas surrounded by exquisite gardens, your imagination is the limit!

But that's not all, you won’t be alone on this island. You’ll meet anime girls with irresistible personalities who will accompany you every step of your adventure.

Rescue them, build special connections with them, and let them help make your home an even more welcoming place. Each girl has something unique to offer you!

Features:

-Explore a paradise island full of sunshine and mysteries!
-Design your house in your style and create the perfect home in a relaxing environment.
-Collect resources to create new structures and progress through the island.
-Rescue and connect with anime girls who will help you on your adventure.
-Enjoy relaxing gameplay filled with fun, romance, and creativity.


Make Cozy Earth: Hawaii Island Love Anime Girls your refuge and start your adventure today!
70010000095133.intro: Escape to the paradise of Hawaii and live a magical adventure surrounded by anime girls and breathtaking landscapes! Your home, your island, your story.
70010000095133.name: Cozy Earth: Hawaii Island Love Anime Girls

70010000095138.description:
A fast-paced, 2D action game, where your goal is to destroy the endless waves of flying orb bots and fly higher with every run, until the Leviathan is saved!

FAST-PACED COMBAT
Dash swiftly from enemy to enemy while chaining together special attacks, obtaining combos, and exploiting the power of your enemies!

UPGRADES
Forge and upgrade runes in the camp to obtain special skills and make the Leviathan even more powerful, so you can ascend even further!

MINIGAMES
Complete challenges, collect fish and meet new friends to make the journey easier.
70010000095138.intro: A fast-paced, action-packed pixel art game, where you have to help a Leviathan to reach space by defending it from an endless robot army.
70010000095138.name: Skies Above

70010000095169.description:
Your helicopter crashes in a remote, icy wilderness en route to delivering batteries to a mysterious research facility. 
Now, you must complete your delivery before you freeze to death or get eaten by a strange presence stalking you.

•	A terror simulator
•	Intuitive Physics-Based Item Interaction
•	Atmospheric Exploration
70010000095169.name: Snow Squall Grip

70010000095279.description:
Winter is coming, and Chippy, the cleverest squirrel in the forest, needs to stash his precious acorns! In Chippy’s Stash, a charming tile-based puzzle game, you must help Chippy push acorns into hollow tree stumps, overcoming obstacles that will test your wit and strategy.

Each level introduces new mechanics to make the journey even more fun: mud tiles that make acorns slide, fallen trunks that redirect movement, and burrow tiles that teleport acorns across the map!

Explore three unique biomes, each offering increasing challenges:
Spring – Learn the basics and master the first puzzles.
Summer – New mechanics and larger maps to test your skills.
Autumn – The ultimate challenge! All mechanics combine to create complex and engaging puzzles.

With charming pixel art and puzzles ranging from relaxing to challenging, Chippy’s Stash is perfect for casual players who love smart, strategic gameplay.

The forest needs a master strategist—are you ready to help Chippy prepare for winter?
70010000095279.name: Chippy's Stash

70010000095869.description:
A world full of sunshine, fun, and romance awaits you on the most beautiful tropical island. Explore this island paradise, rescue charming boys, and create the home of your dreams. Everything you’ve always imagined is within your reach!

Do you love decorating and designing? Here, you can build your dream house, customize it with unique furniture, and add that special touch you've always wanted. From cozy beachside homes to tropical villas surrounded by exquisite gardens, your imagination is the limit!

But that's not all – you won't be alone on this island. You’ll meet irresistible anime boys with unique personalities who will accompany you every step of your adventure.

Rescue them, form special connections, and let them help make your home an even more welcoming place. Each boy has something unique to offer!


Features:
-Explore a paradise island full of sunshine and mysteries!
-Design your house in your style and create the perfect home in a relaxing environment.
-Collect resources to build new structures and progress through the island.
-Rescue and connect with anime boys who will help you on your adventure.
-Enjoy relaxing gameplay filled with fun, romance, and creativity.


Make Cozy Earth: Hawaii Island Love Anime Boys your refuge and start your adventure today!
70010000095869.intro: Escape to the paradise of Hawaii and live a magical adventure surrounded by anime boys and breathtaking landscapes! Your home, your island, your story.
70010000095869.name: Cozy Earth: Hawaii Island Love Anime Boys

70010000096050.description:
Welcome to the exciting world of classic puzzles, where charming girls in stylish, daring cyberpunk images are waiting for you! Each image is a skillful combination of futuristic surroundings, chrome details and seductive curves, drawn in a luxurious anime style.

Experience the pleasure of a realistic puzzle assembly process and step by step discover images of attractive beauties in the neon scenery of the cyberpunk world. Their bold outfits and provocative looks will not leave you indifferent.

Game features:

- More than 40 unique puzzles with charming cyberpunk girls.
- Realistic feeling of assembling a real paper puzzle.
- High-quality anime illustrations with detailed drawing.
- Relaxing, atmospheric music that enhances the immersion effect.
- Possibility to examine each image in detail after assembly.

Dive into the neon world of passion and technology, uncover the secrets of futuristic beauties and enjoy the aesthetics of cyberpunk!
70010000096050.intro: Dive into the world of cyberpunk, enjoy the process and discover seductive illustrations!
70010000096050.name: Hentai Puzzle: Cyber Girls

70010000096075.description:
"I Am Busy Digging a Hole" – and you'll be busy too! Grab your shovel and discover what treasures lie beneath the surface in this delightful digging adventure. The deeper you go, the more exciting your journey becomes.

Dig through layers of earth to find valuable ores that you can sell for upgrades. Make your shovel stronger and your backpack bigger as you continue your busy digging life. Along the way, uncover rare dragons and ancient coins hiding in the dirt.

Each dragon you rescue finds a home in your yard, creating a lively community above ground. And for those who dig deep enough, rumors of a mysterious cave dweller might lead to undiscovered worlds.

● Colorful Underground – Explore a vibrant world beneath your feet with surprises at every depth.

● Rewarding Progression – Sell ore, upgrade equipment, and watch your digging skills improve.

● Dragon Collection – Build a unique dragon sanctuary in your yard with each new discovery.

● Hidden Mysteries – Some secrets are buried deeper than others, waiting for the most determined diggers.

● Relaxing Experience – Get busy digging at your own pace in this charming underground adventure.
70010000096075.name: I Am Busy Digging a Hole

70050000053525.description: "Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Ultimate" launch edition exclusive DLC, which includes skins for Mikoto, Waka, Yuzuha and Itsuki.
70050000053525.name: PBBGU - Physical Launch Edition DLC [NA]

70050000056556.description: After completing the main story of SEKIMORI GAMI - SAIEN, the main characters in the additional scenarios “Yoruichi Epilogue” and “Tsukiomi Arc” will be fully voiced.
70050000056556.intro: The main characters in Yoruichi Epilogue and Tsukiomi Arc in SEKIMORI GAMI - SAIEN are now fully voiced!
70050000056556.name: Yoruichi Epilogue & Tsukiomi Arc - Main Character Voice Pack

70010000079426.description:
Dive into the enchanting worlds of LUNAR: Silver Star Story Complete and LUNAR 2: Eternal Blue Complete, two beloved JRPGs that have captured the hearts of gamers for generations. 

LUNAR: Silver Star Story introduces Alex, an aspiring Dragonmaster who bands together with his friends to combat the perilous emergence of the Magic Emperor and stop him from taking over the world. 

LUNAR 2: Eternal Blue picks up a thousand years later, and follows Hiro and his friends as they set out in search of the Goddess Althena alongside an enigmatic girl named Lucia. On this grand quest, fend off enemies like Borgan and White Knight Leo, who hunt down the group to eradicate what they deem to be the "Destroyer of Lunar." 

This definitive remastered edition features enhanced graphics, audio, and quality-of-life improvements that will satiate that hunger for 90s nostalgia--better than you remember! Embark on these two adventures with updated language support, now available in English, Japanese, French, and German.
70010000079426.intro: The timeless classics from the Silver Star make their return after 25 years!
70010000079426.name: LUNAR Remastered Collection

70010000093085.description:
You are an ambitious penguin who brandishes a stylish bandana and aspires to be a parkour master.

Run, jump, dive, and swim through different and six unique zones containing challenging levels to demonstrate your esteemed parkour prowess. Choose from multiple difficulty settings including easy, normal, and hardcore modes.

Battle menacing bosses at the end of each area. 

Thrill Penguin is a return to old-fashioned platforming fun without complications or pretense.


Features
* 54 Levels
* Battle 6 powerful bosses
* You are a penguin
* Platform action gameplay
* Hand-crafted levels
* Multiple difficulty settings
70010000093085.name: Thrill Penguin

70010000093339.description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey in Only Up!, where the only way is up! Test your precision, patience, and platforming skills as you navigate towering obstacles, floating platforms, and unpredictable pathways to reach the highest heights. Every step is a challenge, every jump is a risk, and one wrong move could send you tumbling back down.
With realistic physics, immersive visuals, and a thrilling sense of vertical exploration, Only Up! offers an intense and rewarding experience for those who dare to climb. How far can you go before gravity catches up with you?
Key Features:
- Climb to the Top – Conquer a massive vertical world filled with unique obstacles.
- Precision & Timing – Every movement matters. Stay focused or fall!
- Dynamic Environments – Experience a surreal world with floating islands, twisting paths, and unpredictable terrain.
- Skill-Based Gameplay – No shortcuts, just pure challenge and mastery.
-No Limits – How high can you reach before making a mistake?
Take a deep breath, take a leap, and begin your climb in Only Up! – a true test of patience and skill!
70010000093339.intro: No turning back. How high can you go?
70010000093339.name: ONLY UP!

70010000093691.description:
Dive into this immersive game, taking on the role of Victoria, a young girl orphaned after a tragic sea accident, trapped in the enigmatic confines of a mysterious city. In a place full of traps and dangers, Victoria must rely on her dexterity to advance.
But Victoria will not be alone on this journey. She joins other orphaned children, inexplicably locked away for sinister purposes. Victoria's mission involves locating and liberating these children, each of whom has unique abilities crucial for overcoming the challenges that lie ahead.
But, the perils extend beyond traps and puzzles. Victoria is chased by humanoid creatures with the only goal of devouring her. In order to stop these creatures, Victoria uses the environment to create distractions with her slingshot, facilitating her escape.
Join the orphans on their journey to escape the city of animals. In this world, survival is a collective endeavor and no one can face it alone.
70010000093691.intro: Join Victoria on her journey through a dystopian city, where the savage instincts lurk around every corner.
70010000093691.name: Orphans

70010000091888.description:
In Dragons Legacy: Monsters Lair, you become a powerful dragon, embarking on an epic quest to defeat monstrous foes and unlock the keys to new realms. As you explore vast, dangerous landscapes, you’ll face fierce monsters determined to defend the keys you need to escape. Take control of multiple dragons, each possessing unique abilities, and unleash your wrath on all who stand in your way. Soar through treacherous skies, unleash fiery attacks, and battle your way to victory in a world filled with danger, mystery, and boundless adventure.
Features:
- Savage Dragon Combat: Engage in intense melee battles, using your dragon’s claws and fangs to overpower enemies.
- Fireball Fury: Incinerate enemies from a distance with devastating fireball attacks, raining fiery destruction upon them.
- Soaring Flight: Experience the thrill of flight as you glide across treacherous terrains, dodging enemy attacks and exploring from above.
- Dragon Awakening: Hatch new dragons from eggs, each awakening with unique abilities and powers to aid you in your journey.
- Portal Mastery: Defeat formidable monsters, collect the keys they guard, and unlock portals to breathtaking new worlds brimming with challenges.
- Dragon Roster: Build a powerful collection of dragons, selecting which one to command as you unlock and hatch new eggs in each realm.
70010000091888.intro: The dragons have awakened—will you rise or fall?
70010000091888.name: Dragons Legacy : Monsters Lair

70010000095652.description:
Hit Back is an intense sword-fighting showdown where precision and timing are the keys to victory. Grab your sword, step into the arena, and prepare for battle! Strike the ball with perfect timing to send it hurtling toward your opponent—but stay sharp, because it’s coming right back! As the rally speeds up, land perfect hits to unleash even more power and overwhelm your enemy.

Compete in thrilling tournaments, starting from the quarterfinals and fighting your way to the ultimate championship. Earn wins and collect coins to rank up and unlock a collection of 50 unique swords. Do you have what it takes to become the Hit Back King?
70010000095652.intro: Fast-paced sword rally battles. Strike, deflect, and dominate!
70010000095652.name: Hit Back

70010000095914.description:
Grab your cue and get ready for the most exciting pool experience! Pool With Me lets you play 8-ball pool in both 3D and 2D modes—whether you want realistic physics or fast-paced arcade action.

• Play with Friends – Challenge up to 4 players locally or compete online.
• 5 Stylish Locations – From neon-lit bars to classic pool halls, each table has its own vibe.
• Championship Mode – Prove your skills and climb the ranks to become the best!
• Easy to Learn, Hard to Master – Simple controls for beginners, deep gameplay for pros.

Perfect for quick matches, parties, or intense tournaments—Pool With Me delivers fun for everyone!

Are you ready to rule the table?
70010000095914.intro: Pool With Me – The Ultimate 8-Ball Pool Challenge!
70010000095914.name: Pool With Me

70010000096695.description:
Experience the thrill of bowling like never before! Step into the ultimate bowling arena designed for endless fun with friends and family. Enjoy local multiplayer action with up to 4 players, creating unforgettable moments and friendly competition.

Play single matches for quick fun or compete in exciting tournaments to prove your bowling mastery. Challenge your friends directly or take on the device with 3 distinct AI difficulty levels—ideal for both beginners and experienced bowlers. Immerse yourself in an authentic bowling atmosphere, with this true-physics simuation featuring realistic sound effects recorded in genuine bowling alleys, bringing each throw vividly to life.

Marvel at astonishing graphics, intricately detailed lanes, and dynamic visuals that elevate every round. Whether you're competing fiercely or enjoying casual play, it's the perfect way to share laughs and excitement with your favorite people.

Play solo or gather your crew, choose your favorite bowling ball, and let the good times roll!
70010000096695.intro: Multiplayer true-physics bowling game, up to 4 players
70010000096695.name: Masters Bowling

70010000049074.description:
You are a CyberCorp fighter. In your hands lies a unique and dangerous technology - the Synth, a remotely controlled combat shell. Are you ready to take your weapon and return order to the streets of the city?

Flexible progression system
Upgrade your equipment using a card-based system of weapon and armor enhancements. Build and customize to match your playstyle.

Multiplayer
Play story and side missions with friends or random players. Equip smart and make builds for multiplauer combos.

Slums, factories, laboratories, elite residential complex
Complete missions in various locations, explore the city of the future. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of cyberpunk.

Fast paced gameplay
Defend objects, hack security systems, capture control points, and uncover hidden items.

Loot shooter
Choose your difficulty level and get the rewards. There's something for those who seek a more casual experience or a hardcore challenge.

Procedural level generation
Map, enemies, loot, encounters, weather, boss, reward are all randomized each run.
70010000049074.intro: Brutal isometric co-op loot shooter in cyberpunk world. Equipment-based combos, exotic weapons and armor - easy to start, hard to master. Play solo or multiplayer with friends!
70010000049074.name: CyberCorp

70010000089950.description:
Preserve is a puzzle nature-building game that takes players on a journey into a harmonious ecosystem. The objective is to foster and sustain a thriving and diverse biomes, where each component coexists in a symbiotic harmony. By utilizing strategic thinking and a keen eye for balance, players are granted the power to position a wide array of plants and animals, curating an environment that caters to their preferences and aspirations.

Vertical Expansion - In Preserve, you can expand the map not only horizontally, but you also posses an ability to stack layers of nature, forming a vertical network of interconnected habitats.

Diverse Biome Habitats - From alpine forests and savannas to carribean reefs, each biome will have its own unique set of plants, animals, and environmental challenges to discover and overcome.

Multiple Game Modes - Besides regular harmony and puzzle game modes, creative mode lets you build the land without limitations and photo mode allows you to capture and share your creations at the end of each session.


Natural Wonders - Nothing can beautify your map more than natural wonders like the snowy Alps, lavender fields or redwood forests, which you can acquire thanks to a unique card upcycle system
70010000089950.intro: Preserve is a relaxing puzzle nature-building game in which you flourish a vibrant ecosystem by cleverly placing plants and animals.
70010000089950.name: Preserve

70010000082102.description:
Rediscover Game Night with the magic of Sunderfolk, a shared turn-based tactical RPG adventure where your mobile device becomes the controller*.  Built with a couch co-op experience in mind, up to four players adventure through the magical and dangerous Sunderlands.
*The free mobile app is required to play the game.

Each player picks one of six classes (Arcanist, Bard, Berserker, Pyromancer, Ranger, or Rogue). Together, players venture out into the Sunderlands and engage in turn-based tactical combat.  During combat, there is no set player turn order, so your strategy can adapt at a moment's notice to react to evolving battlefield conditions. With new enemies appearing at every turn, it's up to your party to co-operatively find the best path to success. 

Between missions, players return to Arden and help improve their home village. Unlock and upgrade different local vendors, build relationships with other Sunderfolk to earn rewards, and outfit characters with new Skills, Weapons, Trinkets, and more.

As heroes of Arden, protect the town and its Brightshard from the corruption of shadowstone and defeat threats from the surrounding Sunderlands. 

Couch Co-Op First
The best adventures are meant to be shared. Up to four players can play together in this new tactical RPG adventure where your mobile device becomes the controller. 

Step into a New World 
Scan a QR code on the display, download the free Sunderfolk phone app*, and transform your phone or tablet into a controller, hand of cards, rule book, inventory, and more. All friends and family can learn to play quickly, since all they need will be in-hand. 

Six Unique Heroes 
Traditional RPG classes have been reimagined in Sunderfolk. Take up the mantle of an Arcanist, Bard, Berserker, Pyromancer, Ranger or Rogue – each with their own playstyle. Tailor your character’s strengths with Skill Cards. Power up with Trinkets and Weapons to craft your character’s build  quest-to-quest. 

Tactical Combat Inspired by the Tabletop
Each player takes their turn one at a time by choosing one of their Skill Cards to determine their character's actions. Enemies lurk around every corner, each with their own abilities and strategies, and they will challenge your party to change its approach from one encounter to the next.

Rebuild the Village of Arden 
The village of Arden grew around the remnant of a magical substance known as brightstone, but unknown forces from lands outside have started to threaten this community's very existence. Between quests, return to Arden village to upgrade vendors, acquire new items and equipment, and befriend townsfolk for additional rewards. 

Four Players, One Game
Share the experience of Sunderfolk with friends at no extra cost. Our rather unique mobile device as a controller mechanic lets one gamer share the adventure with three friends at no additional cost. A host can even stream a session and have friends join remotely.
70010000082102.name: Sunderfolk

70010000091338.description:
Put your brain to the test across dozens of unique challenges in Hegzis, a chill hex-grid puzzle game presented in colorful 2D style! Select a stage from Serene Beach, Whispering Forest and more, then progress through multiple levels in each world, placing pieces of connected hexes to form lines in any direction.

As you rotate pieces and fill lines to connect all the way across, hexes will disappear and increase your score. But be careful not to block yourself in! Use special tools to fill gaps or clear away unwanted hexes and make room for more. The better you think things through and efficiently place your hexes, the better bonuses you will receive. Unlock new stages or return to cleared ones to improve your score!

• Enjoy colorful stages where you arrange puzzle pieces on a hex grid!
• Clear lines in multiple directions to make room for new pieces.
• Rotate pieces to fit into available hex spaces!
• Use special tools to clear unwanted hexes.
• Unlock new themed stages as you progress!
70010000091338.intro: Master the hex grid as you puzzle through colorfully chill stages, clearing lines and strategically using tools to assist!
70010000091338.name: Hegzis

70010000093755.description:
Fia Quinn is a time traveler, accompanying clients of the ChronoZen Time Travel Agency on jumps to other eras to make sure they don’t rewrite important aspects of history. Some of these people are merely curious. Others have unresolved business. As long as they can pay for the trip, their motivations don’t matter to Fia… until they do.

Jump with Fia into seven time-travel cases spanning two centuries in New York City, from the speakeasies of Prohibition to the vicious gangs of the Gilded Age to the World Trade Center on September 10, 2001. Solve temporal problems, survive paradoxes, and resolve the mistakes of the past or die trying—as many times as it takes. 

What could go wrong? It’s only time travel, after all.
70010000093755.intro: A time travel adventure spanning two hundred years. Dive into the past with time agent Fia Quinn as she embarks on seven trips through time.
70010000093755.name: Old Skies

70050000054367.description:
Expansion Pack No.11
Includes the duet songs featuring five members of V.W.P!
Hum along to some brand-new melodies!
 
 [Included Songs]
 "Magical" (RIM & KAF)
 "Fearless" (RIM & Isekaijoucho)
 "Irreversible" (Harusaruhi & KOKO)
 "Gear" (KOKO & KAF)
 "Prison"(Harusaruhi & Isekaijoucho)
70050000054367.name: Extension Pack No.11  feat. V.W.P

70010000080038.description:
Use psychic powers in Atama to see through the eyes of your pursuers to avoid detection as you investigate a cursed rural Japanese village. You can't fight back; you must rely only on your abilities and your wits to avoid your enemies.

Atama is a stealth horror game set in an isolated Japanese village. Full of devilish puzzles and sinister creatures, with a gameplay focus on seeing through the eyes of enemies, Atama aims to deliver a fresh experience to the genre.

You don't believe in family curses, do you?

Kaede's family had always told her stories about eccentric Aunt Noriko, but she's a superstitious old woman, living so far outside of the city. She has no phone, no Internet... Kaede only knew her via infrequent letters... until they stopped coming.

Distant relatives drift apart all the time, but the last letter was different: Desperate ravings about "your birthright" and "the family curse". What did any of it mean?

Kaede decides to hop the next train out to Kisaragi. To Aunt Noriko.

To a nightmare she never saw coming.

Features:
- see through the eyes of enemies to discover their routes and avoid their gaze, considering you are unable to fight back
- use your wits to solve puzzles
- uncover the mystery of the cursed village
- includes post-game Hardcore Mode with additional challenges and permadeath
- includes Developer Commentary
- having trouble with stealth games? With Story mode you can play through and experience the story without stressing about the challenge.
70010000080038.intro:
See through their eyes.
Stay out of their sight.
70010000080038.name: Atama

70010000088544.description:
Deep Deep Deep Nightmare is a 2D Top Down Shooter. A little boy didn’t listen to his mother’s warnings that eating too much at night would cause nightmares. Now, he must face hordes of monsters and defeat the nightmare bosses to escape.

DEFEAT THE NIGHTMARE BOSSES
Face mini-bosses and nightmare bosses. Use your weapons and skills to win each battle.

SURVIVE THE HORDES OF MONSTERS AND TRAPS
Withstand waves of monsters and deadly traps. Test your skills in increasingly difficult levels.

CHOOSE YOUR ARSENAL
Build your arsenal with a variety of weapons and spells. Personalize your strategy and always be ready for the next enemy.

MAIN FEATURES
- Survive hordes of monsters and traps
- Multiple boss battles
- Collect souls to acquire weapons and spells in the shop
- Weapons and spells with unique effects
- Equip up to 4 weapons to defeat your enemies
- Equip a magic spell to help in your battles
70010000088544.intro: Survive by facing monsters in the nightmare of a little boy who didn’t heed his mother’s warnings that eating too much before bed can cause nightmares.
70010000088544.name: Deep Deep Deep Nightmare

70010000089487.description: Immerse yourself in the world of Clash of Rivals, an exciting strategic card game that puts your tactical skills to the test! Choose from a variety of units—from fearless knights to powerful sorcerers—and build an unbeatable deck to conquer your rivals in thrilling battles. Play your cards wisely, use clever strategies, and become the ultimate champion. Whether you're an experienced player or a beginner, the intuitive gameplay makes it easy to learn while offering deep and lasting challenges. Enter the battle and prove your skills!
70010000089487.intro: Clash of Rivals is a strategic card game where you build a powerful deck of warriors, archers, and mages to defeat your opponents in epic duels.
70010000089487.name: Clash of Rivals

70010000089968.description:
This exciting collection brings you 12 games in one, from developer Technos Japan known for creating the legendary River City and Double Dragon series. This variety pack of titles includes some gems that haven’t been widely ported before! From arcade classics to region-exclusive titles, you’ll have plenty to explore in this collection! Get your hands on these highly exclusive games of legend!

▼ From nostalgic arcade favorites to party games!
Bask in fun memories of arcades back in the day with the arcade games from the 80’s included in this collection. There are even console party games and RPGs in the pack to satisfy fans of all genres!


▼ Featuring rare River City classics!
From the classic and beloved original River City Renegade to the series’ first falling puzzle game, Kunio’s Oden, and even the hyper rare Super Dodge Ball game, you can experience River City history!


▼ Handy new features for a smooth play experience!
The new “Suspend Save” feature allows players to save the current state mid-game at any time! Critical issues preventing game progression have also been addressed, leaving no unintended obstacles to completing the games. Online support means you can hop online to play with or against long-distance friends. Both long-time fans and new players alike will be sure to enjoy these 12 games across many genres!

▼ List of Games
River City Renegade
Kunio's Dodgeball Time, C'mon Guys!
Downtown River City Baseball Story
Kunio’s Oden
THE COMBATRIBES
SugoroQuest++ -DICENICS-
DunQuest
Super Dodge Ball
XAIN'D SLEENA
CHINA GATE
THE COMBATRIBES (Arcade)
SHADOW FORCE

*Please note that SugoroQuest++ -DICENICS- and DunQuest are only available in Japanese.

Since this is a compilation of previous titles, the number of players varies for each title.
XAIN'D SLEENA(Number of players: 1)
DunQuest(Number of players: 1)
River City Renegade(Number of players: 1-2)
Kunio's Dodgeball Time, C'mon Guys!(Number of players: 1-2)
Downtown River City Baseball Story(Number of players: 1-2)
Kunio’s Oden(Number of players: 1-2)
THE COMBATRIBES(Number of players: 1-2)
THE COMBATRIBES (Arcade)(Number of players: 1-3)
Super Dodge Ball(Number of players: 1-2)
CHINA GATE(Number of players: 1-2)
SHADOW FORCE(Number of players: 1-2)
SugoroQuest++ -DICENICS-(Number of players: 1-4)
70010000089968.intro: A 12 Game Package, Including Rare River City Gems!
70010000089968.name: Super Technos World: River City & Technos Arcade Classics

70010000091116.description:
Takumi Sumino is a totally average teenager living in the Tokyo Residential Complex, a place where every day is much like the last and nothing bad ever happens. All that changes when freakish monsters attack the town and start wreaking havoc. A strange creature calling itself Sirei appears and offers Takumi the power to protect those he holds dear... All he has to do is stab himself in the chest!

The next thing he knows, Takumi is in Last Defense Academy, a colossal school in the middle of nowhere surrounded by a wall of otherworldly flames. He and 14 other students have been drafted into the Special Defense Unit, a team tasked with keeping the school safe for the next 100 days. Initiated students transform their blood into the mysterious Hemoanima, a unique type of mutated blood which provides supernatural abilities. How much are they willing to sacrifice to take back their normal lives and save the world from the grotesque school invaders? The curtain rises on 100 days of war and despair...

Extreme Despair-Filled Endings
Takumi's choices will decide his future, but there's no telling what kinds of consequences these decisions might have...

Defensive Battles
When the invaders attack, it's up to Takumi to protect the school in tactical RPG battles. Use each student's unique Specialist Skills to turn the tide of battle in his favor!

Free Time & Exploration
Spend time with Takumi’s teammates to deepen his bonds with them, or explore the wilderness and ruins outside the school. Players can even use the items found to craft gifts and get even closer to Takumi’s allies!
70010000091116.intro: Enroll in the Last Defense Academy and save humanity from despair!
70010000091116.name: The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy-

70010000092426.description:
▼STORY
The TOKIMEKI-filled days that you spent with the 12 members of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. 
 You loved and cherished all of those sparkling moments, each of which shone like a rainbow. 
 But then, all of those irreplaceable memories suddenly slip away from your mind, lost.

"They were so bright and warm, truly irreplaceable... But now, I doubt that I'll ever hold them again..."

The members do all they can for you to regain your lost memories. 
 The curtain rises on the story of you and the 12 members searching for the missing pieces of that TOKIMEKI!

"That TOKIMEKI, once more. And forevermore."

▼A school life searching for TOKIMEKI with the 12 members.
Interact with the members and deepen your bonds! 
You can also chat with other students outside of the School Idol Club ♪

▼Enjoy special moments with the members 
Various events will occur as your bonds deepen! 
Enjoy the members' various expressions they would show only to you alone ♡ 
Exclusive new visuals of the cute members are also included!

▼Gather pieces of TOKIMEKI
As you interact with the different members, your memories will change...? 
Accumulate precious memories and strengthen the bond between you and the members!

▼The future will change based on your choices!
Experience different endings for each member! 
The future's in the palm of your hands! 
What will await you after clearing all the endings...?
70010000092426.intro: The first visual novel game of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club!
70010000092426.name: Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club TOKIMEKI Roadmap to Future

70010000093558.description:
An application that contains the digital short novel. This application is a digital pre-order bonus. Learn more about the character Hiruko Shizuhara, then join her and her classmates as they defend the academy from invaders in the game.

*The digital short novel is accessible through a separate application from the main game.
70010000093558.intro: An intriguing short novel that serves as a prologue for one of the characters in The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy-.
70010000093558.name: The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy- Digital Short Novel

70010000093559.description:
An application included in The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy- Digital Deluxe Edition that contains the digital art book. Defend the academy from invaders, then sit back and enjoy the art at the heart of the game!

*The digital art book is accessible through a separate application from the main game.
70010000093559.intro: A gorgeous digital art book featuring art from the world of The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy-!
70010000093559.name: The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy- Digital Art Book

70010000093560.description:
An application included in The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy- Digital Deluxe Edition that contains the digital soundtrack. Defend the academy from invaders, then sit back and enjoy the music at the heart of the game!

*The digital soundtrack is accessible through a separate application from the main game.
70010000093560.intro: An evocative digital soundtrack featuring songs from the world of The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy-!
70010000093560.name: The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy- Digital Soundtrack

70010000094158.description:
Welcome to Sunseed Island, the perfect escape for cozy gamers who love to farm, explore, and collect! Rebuild a lost village, befriend magical creatures, grow crops, fish in tranquil waters, and upgrade your tools. Discover the secrets of a mystical tree and reconnect the scattered islands!


Key Features:
- Rebuild & Restore – Help quirky NPCs bring their village back to life.
- Explore Diverse Islands – Travel across five unique biomes full of secrets.
- Complete Themed Exhibitions – Collect insects, fossils, fish, dishes, and plushies for the town hall.
- Upgrade & Expand – Improve your tools to farm, mine, and gather resources more efficiently.
- Relax & Fish – Cast your line and reel in a variety of unique fish.
- Meet Magical NPCs – Each has an animal-like form and a symbol reflecting their role.
- Uncover a Cozy Mystery – Restore the Great Sunseed Tree and reunite the islands.


A long time ago, the islands were united by the Great Sunseed Tree, but when its power faded, the land shattered. Now, it’s up to you to restore the islands, rebuild the village, and uncover hidden magic.

Travel through five stunning biomes, each packed with wildlife, treasures, and secret challenges. Donate insects, fossils, fish, and dishes to themed exhibitions in the town hall and earn adorable plushies for completing NPC quests. Upgrade your tools to gather resources more efficiently and unlock new possibilities.

Meet quirky, magical NPCs, each inspired by real animals and marked with a symbol reflecting their role. Navigate freely, interact seamlessly, and enjoy a stress-free farming adventure!

Set sail for Sunseed Islands and let your cozy journey begin!
70010000094158.intro: Set sail, collect, and restore – cozy vibes, charming creatures, and endless discoveries await!
70010000094158.name: Sunseed Island

70010000094510.description:
Get ready for an exciting trampoline adventure! Guide the boy as he jumps higher and higher, performing flips and tricks in the air. Each jump brings new opportunities to score big and discover surprises. The game is simple to play, but super fun. You'll want to keep coming back for more!

Aim carefully, time your jumps and watch the magic happen as you pull off amazing moves and earn bonus points. Each jump gives you a chance to unlock more fun and surprises. How high can you go?

The more you play, the more cool stuff you'll discover. Play for a few minutes or stay as long as you like - the bouncy fun never ends!

Check out this fun new game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Jump for your life!
70010000094510.intro: Jump higher and try not to fall!
70010000094510.name: Jumping Boy

70010000094540.description:
Move through 3D space to find hints, solve mysteries and escape from the room.
Anyone can play to the end because you can see hints and answers.
70010000094540.name: Escape game R00M03

70010000094738.description:
Cave of Illusions surrounds a series of events in Looninville, New Hampshire, where an eight-year-old girl vanishes abruptly. Her name was Addie Baker, and strangely enough, she is not the first to disappear in Looninville. For Lesley Jacobson, now a private phenomenon investigator, Addie Baker was her best friend and neighbor growing up. Twenty-eight-years later, Lesley is still haunted by the night Addie disappeared, as she was the only one to witness it, or was she?

Deciding to combine her personal and professional life, Lesley returns to Looninville to close the mystery and move forward in life with her daughter. Lacking to find any concrete evidence or input from the skittish locals, Lesley returns to the one place that appears to be at the center of these strange occurrences, a cave. The uneasy problem with this, is that Lesley does not remember there ever being a cave at all.

Cave of Illusions is a psychological, atmospheric horror game that will have you questioning every step taken as the reality around you will begin to shift. Things are not always as they seem, even when witnessed with the naked eye, and one must pursue the constant battle of the mind with remembering what you think you know and understanding what you actually know. How long can one wear the mask of sanity?
70010000094738.intro: A psychological indie horror game. While seeking to find the truth about the disappearances in the forest you find a lot more than you expected.
70010000094738.name: Cave of Illusions

70010000094855.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Geomdansan , Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 3 flight courses. 
High-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery.
70010000094855.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!
70010000094855.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Geomdansan

70010000095261.description:
Step into the halls of a hospital filled with mystery, desire, and raw emotion. Meet irresistible nurses, each with their own unique charm, and protect them—not just from outside threats, but from the wounds they carry within.

Through intimate questions and emotionally charged strategy gameplay, unlock suggestive images and endings as intense as they are unexpected.

Each nurse hides more than her uniform reveals. Can you truly understand her heart… and win it?


Features:

-Unique dual gameplay: Switch between deep, revealing questions that uncover her soul and defense mode, where you must shield her heart from emotional tension and past regrets.

-Suggestive scenes and unforgettable moments: Unlock intimate images and meaningful encounters—experiences that only unfold if you truly connect with her.

-Discover her most human side: Each response unveils pieces of her personality, hidden desires, and the secrets behind her professional smile.

-Multiple endings: What happens between you and her depends on your intuition, your choices… and how well you read between the lines.

-A secret, daring question: Reach the final moment and unlock a scene that will change everything.


Can you heal her heart… while yours races faster with every heartbeat?

Dare to live a story where romance, desire, and medicine entwine… and no one leaves untouched.
70010000095261.intro: Uncover the secrets of the hospital… while healing the heart of your ideal nurse.
70010000095261.name: Medical Lab Science: Anime Nurse Love in the Public Hospital

70010000095266.description:
Step into the halls of a hospital filled with mystery, desire, and raw emotion. Meet irresistible doctors, each with their own unique charm, and protect them—not just from outside threats, but from the wounds they carry within. 

Through intimate questions and emotionally charged strategy gameplay, unlock suggestive images and endings as intense as they are unexpected.

Each doctor hides more than his white coat reveals. Can you truly understand his heart… and win it?

Features:

-Unique dual gameplay: Switch between deep, revealing questions that uncover his soul and defense mode, where you must shield his heart from emotional tension and past regrets.

-Suggestive scenes and unforgettable moments: Unlock intimate images and meaningful encounters—experiences that only unfold if you truly connect with him.
